meanings.definition: To ask someone to go somewhere or do something
meanings.sent1: I will invite my friend to the park tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She decided to invite her classmates to her birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to invite the dog to play with a ball.
meanings.sent4: The warm weather seemed to invite everyone outdoors.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flyer will invite many people to the concert.

meanings.definition: To request the presence or participation of someone
meanings.sent1: Please invite your grandparents to the school play.
meanings.sent2: They will invite the mayor to the charity event.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to invite the birds to a nut feast.
meanings.sent4: The music seemed to invite everyone to dance.
meanings.sent5: The beautiful decorations will invite guests to the wedding.

meanings.definition: To offer the opportunity for someone to attend an event or gathering
meanings.sent1: The museum will invite students to the art exhibit.
meanings.sent2: They always invite their neighbors to the barbecue.
meanings.sent3: The flowers seemed to invite the bees to a pollen party.
meanings.sent4: The cozy atmosphere will invite customers to stay longer.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights will invite visitors to the fair.
